ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type , "MQL Task" ) , ISPICKVAL(Type , "Job Alert" ) ), NOT( Allow_closing__c ), NOT( No_Contacts_Available__c ), ISCHANGED( Status ), ISPICKVAL(Status , "Completed" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please use the Qualify / Disqualify actions to close this task, or check "No Contacts Available" if applicable.
